messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: David Williams, your Labour candidate will work hard and campaign for a fairer society...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: David will fight for more local police to make sure our streets are safe.
He will fight for a quality education system that is fair for everyone.
David is determined to protect our NHS and ensure it receives the funding it needs to deliver world-class care.
He will take action to improve our public transport system.
He's fighting for every generation to have the chance to own a decent home.

issues.education: He will fight for a quality education system that is fair for everyone.
issues.health: David is determined to protect our NHS and ensure it receives the funding it needs to deliver world-class care.

housing.content: He's fighting for every generation to have the chance to own a decent home.
